query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM frameworks) as frameworks_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM controls) as controls_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM articles) as articles_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM blogPosts) as blog_posts_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as users_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM organizations) as organizations_count;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2m1ctgqj5uashnj.root --database AS2yc6bjPtUHJmZyFBFARQ --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM frameworks) as frameworks_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM controls) as controls_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM articles) as articles_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM blogPosts) as blog_posts_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as users_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM organizations) as organizations_count;
